title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. L, pt. 161 - Access To Personal Information
content:

§ 161.1 - Purpose and scope
§ 161.2 - Designation of privacy compliance officer

§ 161.6 - Requests for records

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 15, ch. I, subch. L, pt. 161

Statutory authority: Vehicle and Traffic Law, §§ 200[1], 215[a]; Public Officers Law, §
94[2]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
